text: Alfredo Ramos de Oliveira (27 October 1924 - 31 July 2012) was a Brazilian football player. He has played for Brazil national team. == Honours == ;São Paulo * Campeonato Paulista: 1953, 1957 == References == Category:1924 births Category:2012 deaths Category:Footballers from São Paulo (state) Category:Brazilian football managers Category:1954 FIFA World Cup players Category:Association football defenders
title: Alfredo Ramos (Brazilian footballer)
